'''Old Insignia''' is a [[Quest Item]] found on the [[Pudding Isle/2.8|Pudding Isle]] in the [[Golden Apple Archipelago/2.8|Golden Apple Archipelago]]. It is used during the {{Quest|The Discarded Insignia}}.
